actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to transfer certain rights-of-way to the Elephant Butte Irrigation District of New Mexico, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to grant rights-of-way necessary to operate and maintain assumed portions of the Rio Grande project to the Elephant Butte Irrigation District of New Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to transfer certain rights-of-way to the Elephant Butte Irrigation District of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
